meanings.sent1: The plougher worked hard in the fields all day.
meanings.sent2: The farmer hired a skilled plougher to prepare the land for planting.
meanings.sent3: The plougher found a creative way to navigate the rocky terrain.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed made him a true plougher in life.
meanings.sent5: The plougher's hands were calloused from hours of tilling the soil.
